text:
Charles Patrick "Pat" Roberts (born April 20, 1936 in Topeka, Kansas) was a senator from Kansas. Before Roberts was a senator, he was a U.S. House of Representatives member and the chairman for the United States House Committee on Agriculture.
On January 4, 2019, Roberts announced that he will not seek reelection in 2020.

annotations.surface_form: United States House Committee on Agriculture
